data.englishTranslation: The Prophet (SAW) said 'Allaahu 'Akbar' (Allah is the Most Great) with each pebble he threw at the three pillars. Then he went forward, stood facing the Qiblah, raised his hands, and called upon Allah. That was after (stoning) the first and second pillar. As for the third, he stoned it and called out 'Allaahu 'Akbar' with every pebble he threw, but when he was finished, he left without standing at it (for supplications).
